Newsletters.description: Read the newsletters to get information about recent events concerning the series/the author. The newsletters also have little shorts involving the characters written for fun.

Toranoko! Keepers.description: Toranoko! Keepers is a side story of the main Toranoko! series. The novel is an anthology consisting of six stories. Each story follows a different adult in the lives of Taiga and Ryūji's daughters: Taiga's parents, Yasuko, Ami and, Ryūji and Taiga themselves. All of them take place before the events of the main series.

Volume 1.description: Starting her second year at Ohashi High School, Haruko, the smartest of the triplets, has only one goal in mind: to get her and her sisters' grades up. However, her path would take a turn after Yuri, her English teacher, decides to randomly assign pairs for her English class. The sisters were terrible with group work, especially Haruko, who always took the snide remarks from her peers to heart. That's why, after getting paired with Sagawa Kaito, an irate, sleep-deprived, loner, she knew she had to steel her resolve. But a terrible incident would befall Kaito, one that Haruko felt partly responsible for. Through her guilt and regret, she tries her best to make it up to him, learning more about the boy as a result.
